name: Tape Core Deluxe
details:
Roland RE-201 style Tape EchoDigital recreation of a tape echo - specifically the Roland RE-201. This pedal has software to modulate and create your own presets.
Simulates analog tape machines in a small package
You can save one preset and choose to have trails or not.
    7 modes that combine 3 virtual tape heads giving you different rhythms.
    8th mode on the Tape Core which is Sound on sound.
    Hold down the foot switch on the Tape Core and you enter tap tempo mode.
    USB port allows to update the effects.
https://www.nuxefx.com/tape-core-deluxe.html
